bike.description: Triple-butted 6061 SuperPlastic Formed (SPF) aluminum, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, PressFit 30 BB shell, over-sized seat tube, crown-clearing down tube, over-sized stays with post mount disc brakes & 12x142mm drop-out, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: X-Fusion Velvet RL 650B, 32mm stanchions, 15mm axle, tapered alloy steerer, air spring, rebound & lockout adjust, magnesium lower legs, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, for tapered head tube, 30mm shim stack
Mavic Crossride 650B, 15mm front, 142mm rear, straight-pull bladed spokes
Shimano SLX shadow rear and Deore front
Shimano Deore hydraulic disc brakes with 160mm RT56 6-bolt rotors
Ritchey Mountain Comp Rizer bar, 31.8 x 20mm rise x 710mm
